017package org.apache.juneau.oapi;
018
019import java.lang.annotation.*;
020import java.nio.charset.*;
021import java.util.*;
022import java.util.concurrent.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.uon.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.utils.*;
030
031/**
032 * Serializes POJOs to values suitable for transmission as HTTP headers, query/form-data parameters, and path variables.
033 *
034 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
035 *    <li class='note'>This class is thread safe and reusable.
036 * </ul>
037 *
038 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
039 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/OpenApiBasics">OpenApi Basics</a>
040
041 * </ul>
042 */
043public class OpenApiSerializer extends UonSerializer implements OpenApiMetaProvider {
044
045   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
046   // Static
047   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
048
049   /** Reusable instance of {@link OpenApiSerializer}, all default settings. */
050   public static final OpenApiSerializer DEFAULT = new OpenApiSerializer(create());
051
052   /**
053    * Creates a new builder for this object.
054    *
055    * @return A new builder.
056    */
057   public static Builder create() {
058      return new Builder();
059   }
060
061   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
062   // Builder
063   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
064
065   /**
066    * Builder class.
067    */
068   @FluentSetters
069   public static class Builder extends UonSerializer.Builder {
070
071      private static final Cache<HashKey,OpenApiSerializer> CACHE = Cache.of(HashKey.class, OpenApiSerializer.class).build();
072
073      HttpPartFormat format;
074      HttpPartCollectionFormat collectionFormat;
075
076      /**
077       * Constructor, default settings.
078       */
079      protected Builder() {
080         produces("text/openapi");
081         format = HttpPartFormat.NO_FORMAT;
082         collectionFormat = HttpPartCollectionFormat.NO_COLLECTION_FORMAT;
083      }
084
085      /**
086       * Copy constructor.
087       *
088       * @param copyFrom The bean to copy from.
089       */
090      protected Builder(OpenApiSerializer copyFrom) {
091         super(copyFrom);
092         format = copyFrom.format;
093         collectionFormat = copyFrom.collectionFormat;
094      }
095
096      /**
097       * Copy constructor.
098       *
099       * @param copyFrom The builder to copy from.
100       */
101      protected Builder(Builder copyFrom) {
102         super(copyFrom);
103         format = copyFrom.format;
104         collectionFormat = copyFrom.collectionFormat;
105      }
106
107      @Override /* Context.Builder */
108      public Builder copy() {
109         return new Builder(this);
110      }
111
112      @Override /* Context.Builder */
113      public OpenApiSerializer build() {
114         return cache(CACHE).build(OpenApiSerializer.class);
115      }
116
117      @Override /* Context.Builder */
118      public HashKey hashKey() {
119         return HashKey.of(
120            super.hashKey(),
121            format,
122            collectionFormat
123         );
124      }
125
126      //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
127      // Properties
128      //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
129
130      /**
131       * <i><l>OpenApiCommon</l> configuration property:&emsp;</i>  Default format for HTTP parts.
132       *
133       * <p>
134       * Specifies the format to use for HTTP parts when not otherwise specified via {@link org.apache.juneau.annotation.Schema#format()}.
135       *
136       * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
137       * <p class='bjava'>
138       *    <jc>// Create a plain-text serializer.</jc>
139       *    OpenApiSerializer <jv>serializer1</jv> = OpenApiSerializer
140       *       .<jsm>create</jsm>()
141       *       .build();
142       *
143       *    <jc>// Create a UON serializer.</jc>
144       *    OpenApiSerializer <jv>serializer2</jv> = OpenApiSerializer
145       *       .<jsm>create</jsm>()
146       *       .format(<jsf>UON</jsf>)
147       *       .build();
148       *
149       *    String <jv>string</jv> = <js>"foo bar"</js>;
150       *
151       *    <jc>// Produces: "foo bar"</jc>
152       *    String <jv>value1</jv> = <jv>serializer1</jv>.serialize(<jv>string</jv>);
153       *
154       *    <jc>// Produces: "'foo bar'"</jc>
155       *    String <jv>value2</jv> = <jv>serializer2</jv>.serialize(<jv>string</jv>);
156       * </p>
157       *
158       * <ul class='values javatree'>
159       *    <li class='jc'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat}
160       *    <ul>
161       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat#UON UON} - UON notation (e.g. <js>"'foo bar'"</js>).
162       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat#INT32 INT32} - Signed 32 bits.
163       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat#INT64 INT64} - Signed 64 bits.
164       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat#FLOAT FLOAT} - 32-bit floating point number.
165       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat#DOUBLE DOUBLE} - 64-bit floating point number.
166       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat#BYTE BYTE} - BASE-64 encoded characters.
167       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat#BINARY BINARY} - Hexadecimal encoded octets (e.g. <js>"00FF"</js>).
168       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat#BINARY_SPACED BINARY_SPACED} - Spaced-separated hexadecimal encoded octets (e.g. <js>"00 FF"</js>).
169       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat#DATE DATE} - An <a href='http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14'>RFC3339 full-date</a>.
170       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat#DATE_TIME DATE_TIME} - An <a href='http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14'>RFC3339 date-time</a>.
171       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat#PASSWORD PASSWORD} - Used to hint UIs the input needs to be obscured.
172       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat#NO_FORMAT NO_FORMAT} - (default) Not specified.
173       *    </ul>
174       * </ul>
175       *
176       * @param value The new value for this property.
177       * @return This object.
178       */
179      @FluentSetter
180      public Builder format(HttpPartFormat value) {
181         format = value;
182         return this;
183      }
184
185      /**
186       * <i><l>OpenApiCommon</l> configuration property:&emsp;</i>  Default collection format for HTTP parts.
187       *
188       * <p>
189       * Specifies the collection format to use for HTTP parts when not otherwise specified via {@link org.apache.juneau.annotation.Schema#collectionFormat()}.
190       *
191       * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
192       * <p class='bjava'>
193       *    <jc>// Create a serializer using CSV for collections.</jc>
194       *    OpenApiSerializer <jv>serializer1</jv> = OpenApiSerializer
195       *       .<jsm>create</jsm>()
196       *       .collectionFormat(<jsf>CSV</jsf>)
197       *       .build();
198       *
199       *    <jc>// Create a serializer using UON for collections.</jc>
200       *    OpenApiSerializer <jv>serializer2</jv> = OpenApiSerializer
201       *       .<jsm>create</jsm>()
202       *       .collectionFormat(<jsf>UON</jsf>)
203       *       .build();
204       *
205       *    <jc>// An arbitrary data structure.</jc>
206       *    JsonList <jv>list</jv> = JsonList.<jsm>of</jsm>(
207       *       <js>"foo"</js>,
208       *       <js>"bar"</js>,
209       *       JsonMap.<jsm>of</jsm>(
210       *          <js>"baz"</js>, JsonList.<jsm>of</jsm>(<js>"qux"</js>,<js>"true"</js>,<js>"123"</js>)
211       *    )
212       * );
213       *
214       *    <jc>// Produces: "foo=bar,baz=qux\,true\,123"</jc>
215       *    String <jv>value1</jv> = <jv>serializer1</jv>.serialize(<jv>list</jv>)
216       *
217       *    <jc>// Produces: "(foo=bar,baz=@(qux,'true','123'))"</jc>
218       *    String <jv>value2</jv> = <jv>serializer2</jv>.serialize(<jv>list</jv>)
219       * </p>
220       *
221       * <ul class='values javatree'>
222       *    <li class='jc'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartFormat}
223       *    <ul>
224       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartCollectionFormat#CSV CSV} - (default) Comma-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo,bar"</js>).
225       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartCollectionFormat#SSV SSV} - Space-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo bar"</js>).
226       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartCollectionFormat#TSV TSV} - Tab-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo\tbar"</js>).
227       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartCollectionFormat#PIPES PIPES} - Pipe-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo|bar"</js>).
228       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartCollectionFormat#MULTI MULTI} - Corresponds to multiple parameter instances instead of multiple values for a single instance (e.g. <js>"foo=bar&amp;foo=baz"</js>).
229       *       <li class='jf'>{@link org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartCollectionFormat#UONC UONC} - UON collection notation (e.g. <js>"@(foo,bar)"</js>).
230       *    </ul>
231       * </ul>
232       *
233       * @param value The new value for this property.
234       * @return This object.
235       */
236      @FluentSetter
237      public Builder collectionFormat(HttpPartCollectionFormat value) {
238         collectionFormat = value;
239         return this;
240      }
241

924
925   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
926   // Instance
927   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
928
929   final HttpPartFormat format;
930   final HttpPartCollectionFormat collectionFormat;
931
932   private final Map<ClassMeta<?>,OpenApiClassMeta> openApiClassMetas = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
933   private final Map<BeanPropertyMeta,OpenApiBeanPropertyMeta> openApiBeanPropertyMetas = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
934
935   /**
936    * Constructor.
937    *
938    * @param builder
939    *    The builder for this object.
940    */
941   public OpenApiSerializer(Builder builder) {
942      super(builder.encoding(false));
943      format = builder.format;
944      collectionFormat = builder.collectionFormat;
945   }
946
947   @Override /* Context */
948   public Builder copy() {
949      return new Builder(this);
950   }
951
952   @Override /* Context */
953   public OpenApiSerializerSession.Builder createSession() {
954      return OpenApiSerializerSession.create(this);
955   }
956
957   @Override /* Context */
958   public OpenApiSerializerSession getSession() {
959      return createSession().build();
960   }
961
962   @Override /* HttpPartSerializer */
963   public OpenApiSerializerSession getPartSession() {
964      return OpenApiSerializerSession.create(this).build();
965   }
966
967   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
968   // Extended metadata
969   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
970
971   @Override /* OpenApiMetaProvider */
972   public OpenApiClassMeta getOpenApiClassMeta(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
973      OpenApiClassMeta m = openApiClassMetas.get(cm);
974      if (m == null) {
975         m = new OpenApiClassMeta(cm, this);
976         openApiClassMetas.put(cm, m);
977      }
978      return m;
979   }
980
981   @Override /* OpenApiMetaProvider */
982   public OpenApiBeanPropertyMeta getOpenApiBeanPropertyMeta(BeanPropertyMeta bpm) {
983      if (bpm == null)
984         return OpenApiBeanPropertyMeta.DEFAULT;
985      OpenApiBeanPropertyMeta m = openApiBeanPropertyMetas.get(bpm);
986      if (m == null) {
987         m = new OpenApiBeanPropertyMeta(bpm.getDelegateFor(), this);
988         openApiBeanPropertyMetas.put(bpm, m);
989      }
990      return m;
991   }
992
993   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
994   // Properties
995   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
996
997   /**
998    * Returns the default format to use when not otherwise specified via {@link Schema#format()}
999    *
1000    * @return The default format to use when not otherwise specified via {@link Schema#format()}
1001    */
1002   protected final HttpPartFormat getFormat() {
1003      return format;
1004   }
1005
1006   /**
1007    * Returns the default collection format to use when not otherwise specified via {@link Schema#collectionFormat()}
1008    *
1009    * @return The default collection format to use when not otherwise specified via {@link Schema#collectionFormat()}
1010    */
1011   protected final HttpPartCollectionFormat getCollectionFormat() {
1012      return collectionFormat;
1013   }
1014}
